name: Base Recipe - American Lager
notes:
### [Base Recipe] A golden, balanced, Saison

**OG**: 1.055   **FG**: 1.013
**ABV**: ~5.7%    **IBU**: ~13

**SRM**: 3.0   **Batch Size**: 2.5 Gal   **Start Water**: 3.36 Gal (28.02 lbs)

#### Grain Bill (total weight: 8.73lb)

| Grain/Sugar  | Weight | Color (°Lovibond) | Gravity | Notes | 
| ------------------- | ------- | ------------- |
| American Two-Row Pale | 5lb | 1.8°L | 1.0368 |
| Flaked Corn | 1lb | 0.55°L | 1.0396 |
  
#### Hop Schedule
  
| Variety/Adjunct  | Weight | Alpha Acid (AA%) | Notes | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Tettnanger | 7.08g (.35oz) | 6.1% | @ 60m |

##### Optional Additions/Customizations
Flaked rice is interchangeable with flaked maize in equal amounts.
Fermentation should last 30 days. Remove from cold fermentation and bring to room temp for 3 days (Diacetyl Rest).
Crash cool to 32F, then rack off yeast. Allow to lager for 4 - 6 weeks before carbonating.
Recipe created by Annie Johnson.
  
  
##### Fermentation
White Labs (WLP840) - American Lager Yeast - 75-80% attenuation, 50-55°F, pitch temp 53°F
  
| Purpose  | Temp | Time | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Primary | 53°F | 30d |
| Diacetyl Rest | 68-72°F | 3d |
| Cold Crash | 32-36°F  | 1-3d |
| Lagering | 32-36°F | 4-6w (before carbonating) |
